Dialogue Text: GREETING_A
Woah there! Look at you!
Rude one, you.
Tsalright - I understand.
All geared up... just like the old days.
Back when the org was still functioning...
Nowadays it basically doesn't exist.
But that's neither here nor there.
You're welcome kid.
Who sent you out here?
R1 Text: My dad! He was a scout too!

Dialogue Text: Ahhh... don't tell me... you're Terin's kid!
Kid... not so many people in sector H still support the org.
T's pretty much me and yer pops.
Sharp kid! I know my way around.
Well I'm here if y've got any questions I'll be right here.
RELAPSE_R
If you're coming to me for answers... I've got none.
This rooms been unsolved since the beginning of the org.
I was a scout too, y'know.
I bet you think since you've gotten through TEST this'll be a breeze.
You're too green to recognize the impossible... but it's lookin at you.
RELAPSE_LOOP_RL
You think I can help you?
Terin didn't tell you this?
Well it was our escape plan... essentially.
Couldn't tell ya.
Anything else?
Good luck and all that...
